DOC.brief_title: US Ovulation Inhibition Study Obese Women
DOC.criteria: Female subject request contraception Age : 18 35 year ( inclusive ) ; smoker must older 30 year time informed consent Normal cervical smear require followup ( cervical smear take screen visit normal result document within previous 6 month ) History regular cyclic menstrual period Willingness use nonhormonal method contraception entire study . Pregnancy lactation ( le 3 menstrual cycle since delivery , abortion , lactation start treatment ) Hypersensitivity ingredient study drug Significant skin reaction transdermal preparation sensitivity surgical/medical tape Any diseases condition compromise function body system could result altered absorption , excessive accumulation , impaired metabolism , alter excretion study drug ( e.g. , know skin disease suspect alteration dermal absorption poor adherence patch psoriasis ) Any disease condition may worsen hormonal treatment .
